data.title: Wedding Anniversaries on July 28
data.meta_description: Famous wedding anniversaries and divorces for the 28th of July. See which famous celebrities and historical figures got married and divorced on July 28.
data.text:
Famous Weddings

Henry VIII

English King Henry VIII (49) weds Catherine Howard (16 or 17), his 5th wife

Anne Stuart

Anne Stuart, later the British Queen Anne, marries Prince George of Denmark at the Chapel Royal

Jonathan Edwards

American philosopher and scholar-pastor Jonathan Edwards (23) weds Sarah Pierpont (17), until his death in 1758

Otto von Bismarck

Future German Chancellor Otto von Bismarck (32) weds noblewoman Johanna von Puttkamer (23) in Kolczyglowy, Poland

Joseph Stalin

Future dictator of the Soviet Union Joseph Stalin (27) weds Ekaterina Svanidze (21) at St. David's Church in Tiflis (now Tbilisi, Georgia)

Bette Davis

Actress Bette Davis (42) weds actor Gary Merrill (34) in Mexico

"Wuthering Heights" actress Merle Oberon (46) weds Italian industrialist Bruno Pagliai; divorce in 1975

Lenny Wilkens

NBA player Lenny Wilkens (24) weds Marilyn Reed

Farrah Fawcett

"Charlie's Angels" actress Farrah Fawcett (26) weds "The Six Million Dollar Man" actor Lee Majors (34) at the Hotel Bel-Air in Los Angeles, California; divorce in 1982

Vladimir Putin

Russian president Vladimir Putin (30) weds flight attendant Lyudmila Shkrebneva (25)

Roger Waters

Pink Floyd musician Roger Waters (49) weds (his third time) Priscilla Phillips; divorce in 2001

Two-time Grammy Award winner Sheena Easton (38) weds documentary director Timothy Delarm (35) in Las Vegas

"Sixteen Candles" actress Molly Ringwald (31) weds French writer Valery Lamerignere in Bordeaux, France

Nick Faldo

Six-time British golf champion Nick Faldo (44) weds third wife, Swiss public relations agent Valerie Bercher in a lavish ceremony at his Windsor, England home; divorce in 2006

Steve Martin

Comedian and actor Steve Martin (61) weds Anne Stringfield (35) at his Los Angeles home

"Franklin & Bash" actor Mark-Paul Gosselaar (38) weds advertising executive Catriona McGinn at the Sunstone winery in Santa Ynez, California

Famous Divorces

Ernest Borgnine & Ethel Merman

Broadway musical actress-singer Ethel Merman (56) divorces Academy Award-winning actor Ernest Borgnine (47) after 32 days of marriage
